live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45057.summary: Some customers in Niverville are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45057.title: Dec 14 – Niverville | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
